alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Randolph, northwestern Lawrence and northeastern Sharp Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ravenden Springs, or 16 miles east of Cherokee Village, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Imboden... Ravenden... Ravenden Springs... Annieville... Williford... Armstrong... Birdell... Ozark Acres... Sharum... Eleven Point... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
